detail_desc: Off-the-shoulder blouse in crinkled jersey containing some linen with long raglan sleeves and smocking at the top and cuffs.
Party set with two nipple covers, 30 pieces of garment tape and two sheets of breast-lift tape. The perfect alternative to a bra under low-cut dresses and tops.
Calf-length skirt in a patterned weave. High waist with smocking and a small frill trim. Unlined.

Sleeveless shirt dress in cotton with a collar, button placket and chest pocket with a button. Belt in braided imitation suede, pockets in the side seams and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front and long sleeves.

Top in cotton jersey with long sleeves and a button placket. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s natural physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Straight-cut double-breasted jacket woven in a viscose blend with notch lapels and flap front pockets. Lined.
Trousers in stretch cotton velvet with an adjustable elasticated waist, fake fly and fake button at the waist, fake front pockets  and real back pockets.
Short, straight-cut dress in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, dropped shoulders and short sleeves.

Hoodie in lightweight sweatshirt fabric and a pair of leggings in cotton jersey. Hoodie with a print motif on the front, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Cardigan in a soft rib knit containing some wool. Relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders and extra-long sleeves. Stocking-stitched lapels and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Shoulder bag with an imitation suede front, grained imitation leather back, zip and narrow, adjustable, detachable shoulder strap. Lined. Size 30x36 cm.
Leggings in soft stretch jersey with an elasticated waist and lacing at the front that ties at the hem.

Short dress in an airy cotton weave with frills and a lace trim at the top of the front and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short, flounced sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a wide flounce at the hem. Partly lined.
Short, wide, sports top in printed, fast-drying mesh layered over a vest top with a racer back.

Sleeveless shirt dress in a soft weave with a collar, buttons down the front, chest pocket with a button and pockets in the side seams. Detachable belt in braided imitation suede and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Sleeveless top in soft, patterned viscose jersey with a V-neck, buttons at the front, a yoke at the top and slits in the sides.
Leggings in sturdy, stretch fabric with a matt coating. Elasticated waist.
Pyjamas with a shirt and shorts in an airy cotton weave. Shirt with notch lapels, buttons down the front and short sleeves. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Blouse in a patterned weave with a small stand-up collar, sewn-in ties at the top, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Pool shoes with moulded soles.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.
Sun hat in a cotton weave with ties under the chin. Lined. Width of brim 4.5 cm.
Maxi dress in a viscose weave with narrow, tie-top shoulder straps, a smocked bodice with a small frill trim at the top and tiers to the hem. Unlined.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Playsuit in a softly draping viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.
Jumper in pattern-knit cotton. Shawl collar with a wrapover front and decorative wooden button, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Hats in soft double-layered jersey.

Maxi dress in a crêpe weave made partly from recycled polyester with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps. Gathered, elasticated seam at the waist and a straight-cut skirt with high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Hipster briefs in lace with a high waist, lined gusset, wide sides with elastic crossover straps and medium coverage at the back. The briefs are made partly from recycled polyamide.
Padded gilet in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Lined.

Studio Collection. Overdimensioned T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Short skirt in imitation leather with a high waist, slit at the front of the hem and zip at the back.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a round neck and long sleeves. Buttons and decorative bows at the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Paper straw hat with a band.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist with decorative gathers.
V-neck top in mesh with sewn-on sequins, narrow shoulder straps and a racer back. Jersey lining.

Set with a top and joggers in sweatshirt fabric and a T-shirt in patterned cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with a ribbed, elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems. T-shirt with narrow ribbing around the neckline. The cotton content of the set is organic.

Baby Exclusive. All-in-one suit in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with buttons at the top, crotch and down the legs. Long raglan sleeves, an open back pocket and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Pleated skirt woven in a sturdy viscose blend with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 2-10Y) and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.

Set with a dungaree dress and top in organic cotton. Pattern-weave dress with an elasticated waist, patch pockets and straps with knots at the front that cross and fasten at the back with concealed, adjustable fasteners. Jersey top with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and short, frill-trimmed sleeves.

prod_name: CTH my wireless soft lace bra
detail_desc: Soft, non-wired lace bra with a lightly padded front and shaped cups with ventilating mesh pockets for breast forms. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a wide fastening at the back with seven different positions for best fit.
Suede sandals with covered block heels, open toes and a narrow, adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 5.5 cm.

Straight-cut shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Relaxed-fit top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Blouse in crinkled chiffon with a round neck, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length sleeves. Flounces at the cuffs and hem, and a longer double layer at the hem.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Kids Exclusive. Fine cable-knit tights in a soft wool blend with soft, visible elastication at the waist.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Stripes with a text print down the sides. Mesh inner shorts.

Soft, non-wired bra in ribbed microfibre designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.
Long-sleeved top in sturdy jersey.
Espadrilles with a braided jute trim around the soles and elastic gores in the sides. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.
Tunic in woven fabric with a pleat at the front and bell-shaped hem. V-neck, dropped shoulders, yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.
Fine-knit gloves.
Hipster briefs in soft microfibre with a lace trim at the top and around the legs. Low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.

Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and moulded, padded cups that lift and shape while providing good support. Elasticated hem and a fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes. Medium support.

Quilted, lightly padded jacket in woven fabric with a fleece-lined stand-up collar and zip down the front. Flap patch pockets with a concealed press-stud at the front, a yoke and decorative seams at the back, and slits in the sides. Lined.
Low-necked T-shirt in soft slub jersey made from a cotton and modal blend with a seam down the back.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating mesh sections. Wide waistband with a concealed key pocket. The polyester content of the tights is recycled.
Hipster briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a stand-up collar, covered buttons at the back of the neck and long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs.
Large metal earrings with tear-shaped plastic beads and fabric tassels. Length 7 cm.
Cardigan in soft, purl-knit cotton with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif and decorative faceted plastic beads. Raw edges around the armholes and hem.

Straight-style shirt in dogtooth-patterned pima cotton with a turn-down collar, French front, open chest pocket and gently tapered waist. Yoke at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a rounded hem.
Straight-cut dress in stretch jersey with a round neckline and 3/4-length sleeves. Unlined.
Straight-cut top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Loose fit with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Pyjamas in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Long-sleeved shirt with notch lapels and buttons down the front. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and straight, wide legs.

Set with a sleeveless romper suit in velour made from an organic cotton blend and a long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey. Romper suit with buttoned shoulder straps, a small pocket at the front and full feet with elastic around the heels. Patterned top with lapped shoulders.
Top in jersey made from recycled polyester with a boat neck and short puff sleeves.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
